item.title: About
item.description: Music Producer (No product yet)/ Programmer/ Podcaster Podcast: Official Website: ShuffleShuffle|随机掉落 Listen on: Apple podcast Listen on: 小宇宙 Follow me on Douban: 我的豆瓣 2021/4/30 Note On Migration: This blog has been migrated from original 「狸猫的写作场所」. In the deature, I will focus on music producing (at least I hope so), my thoughts on programming, and the extension from my podcast. Hope to see no more theme changing.
